metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17057 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in TCPDF before 6.2.22. Attackers can trigger deserialization of arbitrary data via the phar:// wrapper.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17057` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-tcpdf - 6.5.0+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdf package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0+dfsg1-1').
